name: Initiation Man
description:
Initiation Man is a short horror FMV game.  It's an adaptation of the classic word guessing game Hangman.

You want to join a cult, but you must pass a simple test in order to prove your worth.  Fail the test and you will perish.  Succeed and you'll become the cult's latest member!

Controls
  • Use the keyboard or mouse to choose a letter.
  • Press Escape to exit the game.

This is a beta version.   Feel free to submit feedback and bug reports using my contact form.
